Summary: Observed orbs entering and leaving mother ship and re-entry into ship
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in The Woodlands
There was one other sighting in The Woodlands on or around August 14th 2012
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting DetailsObserved orbs form into one and attach themselves to mother ship. Several orbs in the sky for long periods of time but moved quickly through the sky. The mother ship hovered for long periods of time. This is the second sighting in the last few days in The Woodlands Texas which I have observed in the late evening hours. More have also been reported by other individuals in the area.
